title: Keen Chronicles - WASN'T a new Keen game
content:
I've been snooping around [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen]Wikipedia[/url], and they've noted that production of Keen Chronicles had begun in 2002 (now abandoned), and would basically have been a port of ALL Commander Keen games for Microsoft Windows and Pocket PC.

It would have been cool if it were released though. Maybe the production company could have added some bonus content to the old games. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] -- Censorship is F**ked! --

title: Re: Keen Chronicles - WASN'T a new Keen game
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] That stinks.

They could of released it but nooooooooo![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-no.gif[/img] Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
"I always try to consume interesting animals."-LevelLord

title: Re: Keen Chronicles - WASN'T a new Keen game
content:
I can't recall reading anywhere that Keen Chronicals was going to be a new Keen game. All I've ever read about it (since 2002) was that it was a port of all the other Keens.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Keen Chronicles - WASN'T a new Keen game
content: Yeah, I know it was going to be a port. But really, annoying they didn't make it! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Keen Chronicles - WASN'T a new Keen game
content:
Spilt milk and all that.

nd yet I still feel vaugely angry... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society
